storyInfo: The Glasgow Gang, under the leadership of their new boss Cador, arduously defends their gym. Golding, under close monitoring, has no choice but to send Molly to warn the Self-Salvation Corps to evacuate.

attributes.content: Alright. We should be safe here.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Cador, it's still a mess outside. We're most certainly not in Londinium anymore. I reckon we can see the situation outside the plate from the top of the old loading tower, but I can't get near it. It's outside the restricted area.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: And I reckon even if you could spot anything, it wouldn't mean a thing. The Sarkaz keep a close eye, and... there are too many of them.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: And what's the old bloke's story?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Hmph, he was trying to talk terms with the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: And how did that turn out?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Take a look yourself.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: There. That's about all I can do, bandaging your wound.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Thank... Thank you.
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Goodness... Why... Just what happened?
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: What else could've happened? The Sarkaz have been in Londinium for four years now.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: You can't possibly still think they were invited here by that poor sod Cavendish as his guests, right?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: But they haven't ever...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Haven't ever what?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: You must be one of those noblemen who never leave their mansions and need their maids to fetch them their morning cystymilk. How'd you fall so low as to find yourself in Norport?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: No, no, I'm but a scholar. I have merely run into certain... troubles financially. As soon as I finish my manuscript, I shall...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Drat! The manuscript is still in my study!
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Baird, you've really got a knack for finding these poor, down-on-their-luck bastards, don't you?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Would you at least have some respect? If all goes well, it's very likely I will become the Royal Academy of Sciences' next academician!
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: 'Very likely.' Heh.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: I still don't understand. The news kept saying that...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: 'All is well.' What more do you want them to say? 'Friends and citizens, I sincerely regret to inform you that Londinium is now a shithole?'
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: The 'special instructors' that they sent to the newspaper offices and TV stations actually earned their keep, you know?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Did you see whose flag they're flying above the munitions factory in Highbury? If not, you've got to at least remember the fire in Auchterigg the other day, right?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: But the war... What about the Defense Forces? The dukes? Aren't they defending us all around Londinium?
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: How can this be...? The Sarkaz can't possibly triumph over the dukes, can they? The devils are a bunch of savages who cower in the wilderness, but Victoria is the greatest country across all the lands!
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Who told you that? Did you realize that out of nowhere while munching on cake at home?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: I didn't feel that way at all when the dibbles held me up against the wall and frisked me.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Alright, 'Next Academician,' off you go. You don't belong here.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: But... where can I go?
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: My flat is not in this lockdown zone, and I haven't the slightest idea where my loyal servant is... I know no one here.
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: What can you do? Medical work, sewing, repair, anything.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: M-My research is in heraldry...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: You scholarly chaps ever studied how to turn air into steaks?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Well... it is by no means my area of expertise, but I'd imagine it's a little difficult...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Baird, stop bringing these fancy lads back, will ya? He doesn't even understand sarcasm.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: We don't have a lot of supplies on hand here.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: *sigh*... Maybe he can help Delphine manage the warehouse?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Baird! Stop trying to pass all your problems to me!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I can't very well watch him die on the street.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: At times like this, we have to come together and unite as one. Even having one extra man on board is more power to us.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: 'Come together...' *sigh*.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I wish Parliament and the dukes would learn from you people. We wouldn't have fallen to where we are today.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: You think they're not united enough? They were all very united when it came to hanging the king.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: That was... *sigh*, never mind.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I just hope you'll be of some use, Mr. 'Next Academician.'
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I shall do everything in my power! Though, speaking of which... who would all of you be?
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Who are we?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Alright, welcome to our gym, the 'Slobberknocker'!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: You can call us Glasgow.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.text: To tell the truth, I haven't any idea where you have been as of late. Ever since Mr. Adams the bookshop owner died, I haven't been able to reach you.
It has been a long time since I last continued our work.
Forgive me, my dear friend. I never hide anything from you.
But I am truly very... befuddled.

attributes.content: You once told me that peace would come again...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: But I can't fool myself with false hope anymore. I can't hide in my room and pretend that everything we do is still meaningful.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Right, we could look at things on a broader scale. 'The dimension of history...'
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Of course, peace will come. It will, eventually.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: And war will undoubtedly shatter it in an even crueler way.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I once thought we could win, and I still hope that we will win.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: But, Heidi, if everything that we have done amounts to nothing but self-comfort...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: No, not 'if.' This might already be the truth...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: These books, these desks, and this school that may come crumbling down at any moment... How are they meant to stand up against the force of a new era?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Heidi, I can't... I can't keep going anymore.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: What should I do?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Lady Golding, are you alright?
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Molly... you're back.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Are you writing a letter?
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: No, this is nothing.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I... I just remembered a few novels that I read before.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: The protagonists are always charming, suave, always heading to the frontlines wearing a uniform befitting of them with a pipe in their mouths.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: But the authors never tell us which battlefield they head to and how the trenches smell.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Those who are enamored of the protagonist, both women and men, taste fine desserts with anxious hearts—
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Of course, we all know these are just literary techniques. The stories always end happily.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Authors with a little bit of ambition might try to build what the critics call a 'profound' atmosphere.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: The stories are adorned with preventable deaths, and they are always the protagonist's comrade and dearest friend, dying in the trenches to shield the hero.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: In the end, the wretched enemy finds themselves defeated by the hero's sword, thus restoring justice and morality.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: And at his fallen friend's funeral, a solemn crowd gathers to remember his heroics, as petals symbolizing honor are scattered atop the casket.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: This is the most emotional part. The protagonist clenches his fist, wipes his tears, and looks toward the morning sun with resolve—
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: And without fail, they always say that hope will come and all sacrifices will be meaningful.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: And there. That's where the author stops. Let the readers imagine for themselves that truly beautiful future. Let them bask in that stately feeling in the end.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I'm surprised you read these kinds of novels.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: It was years ago. Everyone was that age once.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I used to be obsessed with these books when I was still a young girl... I wasn't very attached to the protagonists, actually, but I was indeed obsessed with those deaths.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Sometimes, I imagined myself one of those heroes who sacrificed themselves for their cause, and the masses would sing my praises for the era I helped create or, at the very least, my sacrifice...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Hah. How childish.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Later on, I thought I'd be clear-headed enough to see past these sugar-coated fantasies.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: But then... I started to notice... there might be nothing inherently different between who I am now and who I was back then.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Don't say that. You told the children yourself. Death is a solemn topic.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Hah, did I? I don't remember.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Perhaps it was just the lectures that I've got so used to giving.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: How was procurement today?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Not too bad. The situation on the streets isn't very serious. The prices at the shops haven't gone up, though there were more city defense soldiers than usual, and the Sarkaz solders... they're not as secretive they used to be.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: But everyone is pretending as if nothing has happened. Except... what used to be Norport. There is nothing left except the support structures extending from the surrounding districts.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: What about those places?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I need to apologize to you again. I should never have dragged you into this. It's just... Lettou has his eyes on me, and every time I step out the door, I find myself followed by several ill-meaning men.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I had no choice but to make a gamble—that you are not on their watchlist yet.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: No, I'm glad to do my part for Londinium.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: It's just that the places you told me about were all pretty quiet. I used the passwords, but no one answered.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Maybe... Maybe they've already given up?
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: No, they are all stronger than I am. Much stronger.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: But I've found a letter. It should be for you, so I didn't open it.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: This... No, this isn't their handwriting.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: The letter has practically all the information on the Self-Salvation Corps' communications.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: What?! But... how could that...?
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: This is a threat.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: They... They know us like the back of their hand.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Then... What should we do, Lady Golding?!
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Molly, I'll have another list of places for you.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I've never been to these bases myself, but having analyzed the flow of information... they should be there.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I shouldn't take this risk. This goes against our established practices, but...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: This information is important to the Self-Salvation Corps, right?
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Many lives are on the line.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Then we must do this.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Molly... Just as I taught you, watch out for anyone who could be tailing you. Whether they are Sarkaz or not, do not let your guard down.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Look for a girl called Clovisia there or anyone who can get in contact with her. Tell them that the entire intelligence network has been exposed. They must evacuate immediately!
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Lady Golding, where are you going?
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: To Lettou's office.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I will try to buy as much time as I can for the rest of you.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Relax, I'll be fine. I...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I just hope I'm stronger than I think I am.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Doctor, I had a dream.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I saw... the city shrouded in dark clouds, and bloodstained Sarkaz flags flew above every building. Outside the city... Originium grew everywhere my eyes could see.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I saw a rusted throne towering above the lands. The masses kneeled before it, crying tears stained in black. I saw the person on the throne wave their arm, and the shouts that followed pierced the sky.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yet, in the shadow of the throne, the cowering men lifted their heads ever so slightly...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I felt what they felt...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't know how to describe it... It was so all over the place, so stifled...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I could only make out what was on the surface. That pain...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...and hatred.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Who was that on the throne...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is this the future that the collective souls of the Sarkaz foresaw? Or is this... the duty of the King of Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Did Theresa have this dream? Could this be... the sights she is looking forward to now?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, it can't be.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, this dream... It doesn't mean anything, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You're just exhausted.;It's just a dream.

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right, it was... just a dream...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Is Dr. Kal'tsit better?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hard to say. Her body... was frail to start with, and her wounds are deep.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Shining has attempted several solutions, but all of them were limited in their effectiveness. She has yet to awaken.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Mon3tr seems to be slowly repairing itself. Likewise, we do not have any idea how well it will recover, or whether it can actually even recover.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Doctor... At the Defense Forces' command tower, if only I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Everyone did their best.;None of us expected to see Theresis there.

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I never once imagined that Dr. Kal'tsit would one day be wounded this badly...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She always solved all our problems like they were nothing. She gave us the best advice for every situation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's Dr. Kal'tsit. I've never even seen her look tired!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But now...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know. I will bear the responsibilities that are mine to bear. Rhodes Island's mission here is far from over.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... I want to see Dr. Kal'tsit one more time. May I?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if it's just sitting there by her bed for a short while.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rather than staying with the wounded, you two have more important work to do.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Closure wants you to know that she has finished analyzing the data from the command tower.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Clovisia is calling a meeting.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: We need to reevaluate the situation in Londinium.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: War has broken out.;Our initial plans have failed.

attributes.content: Then please tell us what our step should be.
attributes.name: Ascalon
